Room.Name: Skies Over Kista Forest
Room.ShortDescription: For as far as the eye can see, there is forest. 85.n0.e24.s8.w0
Room.LongDescription: The great forest seems to go on and on, but somewhere to the north is the city of Kista. The beautiful towers at Kista are known throughout the land. Looking south, there is a solitary break in the forest where a black castle, with a single turreted tower, stands.
